name: Brand Registry Group
goal:
Our Vision

To create Internet environments built on trust.

Our Mission

In pursuit of its Vision, the Brand Registry Group has the following Mission.

With respect to the common interests of its members:

to provide services of advocacy, representation, networking and best practice.

With respect to ICANN:

to represent the common interests of its members
to be recognized as an essential stakeholder by ICANN
to champion policies that enhance security, stability and trust for Internet users.

With respect to governments and public bodies:

to represent the common interests of its members
to be recognized as a key interlocutor
to explain why .brand-type registries aid in enhancing consumer protection and a thriving digital economy.

With respect to Internet users:

to improve the understanding of the role of .brand-type registries within the universe of top-level domain names
to deliver consumer protection in e-commerce and branded spaces through the promotion of secure, stable and trusted platforms.
